description: Player-level game statistics for NBA regular season and playoff games from 2010-2024

columns.name: season_year
columns.description: The NBA season year (e.g., '2010-11')

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date when the game was played

columns.name: gameId
columns.description: Unique identifier for each NBA game

columns.name: matchup
columns.description: Team matchup showing visiting team @ home team or home team vs visiting team
columns.validation: Format: TEAM @ TEAM or TEAM vs TEAM

columns.name: teamId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the NBA team

columns.name: teamCity
columns.description: City where the team is based

columns.name: teamName
columns.description: Official team name

columns.name: teamTricode
columns.description: Three-letter abbreviation for the team

columns.name: teamSlug
columns.description: URL-friendly team identifier

columns.name: personId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the NBA player

columns.name: personName
columns.description: Full name of the player

columns.name: position
columns.description: Player's position (G=Guard, F=Forward, C=Center, or combinations)
columns.validation: Valid positions: G, F, C, or combinations like F-G

columns.name: comment
columns.description: Special notes about player status (DNP reasons, injuries, etc.)

columns.name: jerseyNum
columns.description: Player's jersey number
columns.validation: Usually 1-99, but stored as string for special cases

columns.name: minutes
columns.description: Total minutes played in MM:SS format

columns.name: fieldGoalsMade
columns.description: Number of field goals successfully made

columns.name: fieldGoalsAttempted
columns.description: Total number of field goal attempts

columns.name: fieldGoalsPercentage
columns.description: Field goal shooting percentage (0.0-1.0)

columns.name: threePointersMade
columns.description: Number of three-point shots made

columns.name: threePointersAttempted
columns.description: Total number of three-point attempts

columns.name: threePointersPercentage
columns.description: Three-point shooting percentage (0.0-1.0)

columns.name: freeThrowsMade
columns.description: Number of free throws made

columns.name: freeThrowsAttempted
columns.description: Total number of free throw attempts

columns.name: freeThrowsPercentage
columns.description: Free throw shooting percentage (0.0-1.0)

columns.name: reboundsOffensive
columns.description: Number of offensive rebounds (team's missed shots recovered)

columns.name: reboundsDefensive
columns.description: Number of defensive rebounds (opponent's missed shots recovered)

columns.name: reboundsTotal
columns.description: Total rebounds (offensive + defensive)

columns.name: assists
columns.description: Number of assists (passes leading directly to teammate scoring)

columns.name: steals
columns.description: Number of steals (successful defensive plays taking possession)

columns.name: blocks
columns.description: Number of blocked shots (defensive plays stopping opponent shots)

columns.name: turnovers
columns.description: Number of turnovers (loss of possession without shot attempt)

columns.name: foulsPersonal
columns.description: Number of personal fouls committed

columns.name: points
columns.description: Total points scored (2*fieldGoalsMade + 3*threePointersMade + freeThrowsMade - 2*threePointersMade)
columns.validation: Non-negative integer, calculated from made shots

columns.name: plusMinusPoints
columns.description: Plus-minus statistic: team's point differential while player was on court
columns.validation: Integer (can be negative), measures team performance with player on court

to_totals.description: Box scores can be aggregated by gameId and teamId to derive team totals

business_rules: Players with DNP (Did Not Play) status have 0 minutes and 0 for all statistical categories
Total rebounds must equal offensive rebounds + defensive rebounds
Three-point statistics are subset of field goal statistics
Plus-minus reflects team performance differential while specific player was active

for_ai_agents: Use gameId to group players by game for team analysis
Filter by personId for individual player career analysis
DNP players should be excluded from performance averages but included for availability analysis
Plus-minus is context-dependent and should be interpreted with team performance
Minutes played indicates actual game participation (0 = did not play)
common_analyses: Player efficiency: points per minute, shooting percentages
Team composition: position distribution, playing time allocation
Performance trends: season progression, home vs away splits
Head-to-head matchups: player vs player, team vs team historical performance
